PART.P: I am writing to complain about a musical show I saw at the Circle Theatre on Wednesday, June, 14th which was titled "Over the Rainbow".
First of all, the advertisement I got layed emphasis on Danny Brook's starring, but eventually, a disappoint unknown actor played his part, and I wonder whether he had real skills to.
To make matters worse, not only was the restaurant closed, without any appearant reason, but also the discounts that were said to be available were not.
On top of everything, the performance began forty-five minutes late.

I find it unbearable to witness such a lying advertising and to pay even ten pounds to spend such a disappointing evening. Consequently, I ask for money back, and I will not obviously go back in the Circle Theatre. I join my receipt, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Despite Katie's warning, Pat reached her purpose by questioning carefully her friends, and realized Bobby had been forced to rob this camera unless he wanted to be hurt. Pat knew there was no solving the problem without the adults' help. Katie and Bobby would be furious, but anyway... She convicted the two criminals, and had the calm gone back within the school.
